name: Astro-Panic!
overview: An OUTSTANDING ultra-fast machine language game! 15 frantic levels of difficulty! Alien saucers swoop and dive in a relentless attack! Fear not! You have an awesome wonder weapon: you unleash a bolt of incredible power from your laser/heat ray/particle beam/thermonuclear cannon, which atomizes these marauding good-for-nothin' saucers! C64 arcade action. Published in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1984/02 (Issue #08), COMPUTE!'s Second Book of C64 Games, Happy Computer 1987/11 and re-released in the 75 Spill Data-Tronic compilation. It was also released by Italian publisher Mantra Software in MC 1009 under the names Astro Panico, and also Astropanico in 1984 as well.
